summary: An Ordinance amending Section 1 of Ordinance No. 36,032, entitled "An Ordinance relating to and providing for the location of undertaking establishments, morgues, public, community or association mausoleums, and crematories for the disposition of the bodies of the dead within certain districts and localities within the City of Seattle, and prohibiting the construction and maintenance of such institutions outside of such districts, providing penalties for violation and repealing all ordinances in conflict", approved May 20, 1916, as amended by Ordinance No. 38,519, by adding thereto a new subdivision to be known as subdivision Sixteenth.
